metadata.description: The 3 character Azure prefix for the customer for all resources
Specify the name of the virtual network
Specify the name of the virtual networks resource group
Specify the name of the Internal/Application subnet
Specify the name of the Internal/Application network security group
Specify the name of the Private DNS Zone
Specify the name of the storage account
Choose the timezone for the servers

The MSL initial password. Password must be between 6-72 characters long and must contain: 
1) An uppercase character
2) A lowercase character
3) A numeric digit
4) A special character
5) Control characters are not allowed

The password for Windows servers. Password must between 12-123 characters long and must contain: 
1) An uppercase character
2) A lowercase character
3) A numeric digit
4) A special character
5) Control characters are not allowed
A comma-delimited list of remote networks wrapped with "" allowed to access the servers (eg. "1.2.3.4/32", "5.6.7.8/32")
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiVoice Business server
Specify the version of MiVoice Business to deploy
Choose the size of the MiVB to deploy
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiCollab server
Specify the version of MiCollab to deploy
Choose the size of the MiCollab to deploy
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiContact Centre server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose MiCC system size.
Set to 'true' to deploy a SQL server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose SQL system size.
Set to 'true' to deploy an IVR server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Set to 'true' to deploy a MiVCR server
The Windows Server version for the VM. This will pick the latest Gen2 image of this given Windows version.
Choose MiVCR system size.
